I was sent me a link, I'll wait til something comes out on it, I am not  
g=
oing to put spirit  to the test anymore though, it's very hard to  understa=
nd 
them as it is, and I am thankful for what they are giving us at the  
p=
resent time.  sf
 
 
In a message dated 7/10/2010 10:52:42 P.M. Eastern Day=
light Time,  
april@... writes:

 
 
 
I was able =
to download it without a problem. I am not sure why you are  
having troubl=
e with it Snow :/

(mailto:rasterer@...) >  wrote:


 
 
 
Yes.

Also, it is currentl=
y set to only be  viewable after the test is over, and 
on Windows.
If anyo=
ne needs a  Mac version, I could arrange that too.

Rj

n the Files folder?

ail you the file  directly.

owfireL@aol. com> wrote:

  David got upset with  me, he is too busy with 
work over there to play ga=
mes is  what he said, in a nice way. sf

0 7:57:26 P.M. Eastern Daylight Time,

that url doesnt work, can you go  here:

d?

t, 7/10/10,  SnowfireL@aol. com <SnowfireL@aol.  com> wrote:

ireL@aol. com  <SnowfireL@aol. com>

0710
To:  EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com

Date: Saturday, July 10, 2010,  3:00 PM=




 
 
for  some reason, I can't reach that web page anyway  RJ.
 

 
 
In=
 a  message dated 7/10/2010 5:56:08 P.M. Eastern  Daylight Time, 
rasterer@=
yahoo. com  writes:

 
Considering the attacks people  continue to make aga=
inst me on here just 
for  having a different opinion of people's results, =
 I think you will 
understand why I will not post  my name and address here=
.

Try anyway  though.  I don't know how your personal  beliefs here work, =
but 
others seem to get  messages about people they've never heard of, or  =

places they've never seen.

I would also  suggest anyone who tries this ex=
periment, to  post your 
results on the list here rather than  sending them=
 personally to me - so I won't 
be  accused of losing any.



--- On  Sat, =
7/10/10, SnowfireL@aol. com  <SnowfireL@aol. com> wrote:


From:  SnowfireL=
@aol. com <SnowfireL@aol.  com>
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Experiment  20100710=

To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups  .com
Date: Saturday, July 10, 2010, 2:49  PM


 
=
What is your name RJ? and where do you  live?  There are probably tons of 
=
RJ's in  this world, and if i am going to ask any of my  guides if they wan=
t 
to play this game with you,  I will not ask them to run around the world=
 a  
lookin for you. sf
 
 
In a message dated 7/10/2010 3:32:51 P.M.  East=
ern Daylight Time, 
rasterer@yahoo. com  writes:

 

I have placed a little=
 something on top  of my computer monitor, right in 
front of me. It  is no=
w 7/10/2010. I will leave it there 4 days,  and remove 
it Noon Denver time=
, on Wednesday,  7/14/2010.

All you have to do is ask your  boxes/spirits/=
 aliens/etc, what it is.

I  have taken a picture of it, and posted it to t=
he  files section here, so 
there is no way I can  squirm out of the result=
s:

_http://tech.  groups.yahoo. com/group/ EVP-ITC/files/  RJ/RJ.20100710.=
 
1.zip_ (http://tech.groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/RJ/RJ.20100710.1=
.zip) 

Please do not  try to open the file before noon Wednesday. But  fee=
l free 
to download it to your computer  beforehand, so you can be sure I w=
on't 
change it  during, or after, the test.

Answers  anyone reveals after=
 noon Wednesday don't count.  Partial answers 
(like just the color, or sha=
pe,  or some emotion vibe) don't count. Just 
tell me  what it is.

Best of=
 Luck. I hope for this  to be a regularly occurring experiment, and 
I  hop=
e we all can learn from the results.  




































=
